articles.description: Under-fire boss Ange Postecoglou delivers a passionate defence of his legacy as he vows to win silverware at Nottingham Forest if given time.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Under-fire Ange Postecoglou delivers passionate defence of his legacy

articles.description: The Israeli club's supporters will not be allowed to attend the Europa League game over safety concerns.
articles.title: Home Office told last week of potential Maccabi Tel Aviv fan ban, police unit says

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim thinks it is important Sir Jim Ratcliffe went public with his long-term thoughts - but says nothing is certain in football.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim says he can't bank on Sir Jim Ratcliffe's three-year promise

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk is targeting a return to the ring in 2026, but has ruled out a bout with British heavyweight Moses Itauma.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk: Champion rules out Moses Itauma fight but planning 2026 return

articles.description: Apple wins the rights to broadcast Formula 1 in the United States for the next five years in deal said to be worth about $750m (£558m) in total.
articles.title: Formula 1: Apple wins US broadcast rights for next five years in $750m deal

articles.description: Ronda Rousey says no fighter is ever truly retired but plays down speculation she is training for a return to the UFC.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: Former UFC champion addresses comeback rumours after training return

articles.description: Sri Lanka face South Africa in the ICC Women's World Cup - follow live scores and radio commentary.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs South Africa LIVE: Women's Cricket World Cup 2025 score & radio

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Aya and Addison from CBBC football drama Jamie Johnson FC with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Aya and Addison from Jamie Johnson FC, plus AI

articles.description: Opening batter Kiran Navgire breaks the record for the fastest century in women's T20 history with a 34-ball hundred in a domestic match in India.
articles.title: Kiran Navgire: Indian batter breaks record for fastest century in women's T20 history

articles.description: Spain's record scorer Jenni Hermoso has been handed a recall after a 12-month absence by new manager Sonia Bermudez, along with Barcelona defender Mapi Leon.
articles.title: Jenni Hermoso: Spain striker recalled after a 12-month absence by new boss Sonia Bermudez
